DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , multiple-site , placebo-controlled , parallel-group clinical study conduct evaluate bioequivalence two 1 % Clindamycin/5 % Benzoyl Peroxide Topical Gel formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Between Two 1 % Clindamycin/5 % Benzoyl Peroxide Topical Gel Formulations
